sentence.Network_en: Gold was the loadstone that drew men to Alaska.

sentence.Network_en: Yes. The Loadstone Rock was drawing him, and he must sail on, until he struck.
sentence.Network_cn: 是的,磁力礁吸引着他, 他必须扬帆前进, 直至触礁为止.
